Text:
@lif3isfr33,
I've been using TPB for a long time, they are amazing.
You have just inspired me to make a user for the first time to tell you to shut up and learn how to put things to use..
OneFourOne has brought one amazing flawless torrent, your problems with it are from stupidity and nothing more.
Simple as this.
Right Click DFX -> Options -> Uncheck Run On Startup
Logoff -> Open The Keygen -> Generate The Master Pack

Notice registration is gone and you can now use the program to it's full extent.
Now apologize to the OP.
